Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory784.jpg'}
{1: "02: The Lonely Light's Response"}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noan has always been a trusted confidant.'}
{3: 'As you grow closer, you would occasionally toss him some abstract questions during your strolls.'}
{2: 'What\'s your take on the "meaning of life"?', 3: '9'}
{2: 'It just struck me out of the blue.', 3: '11', 4: 'A passing mention by a friend.', 5: '11'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I'm no philosopher. If you're after textbook answers, I might have to sneak a peek myself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'But I reckon, the "meaning of life" lies in the very pursuit of understanding it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Even if you stumble upon an answer, merely having it laid out before you won't convince someone who hasn't lived through it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'So, I suppose everyone has their own interpretation, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: "So that is Noan's take.", 3: '17'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'No, mine is "Why?"', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'If someone\'s content and fulfilled, they seldom ponder "what\'s the meaning of it all," right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "It's when we're adrift or desolate that we wrestle with the purpose of carrying on.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "More than the answer itself... I'm intrigued by... why the questioner is asking.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Feeling low? What's the matter?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nothing, really.', 3: '26'}
{3: 'He nods sagely.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Those moments when "nothing" happens can be rather taxing in their own right.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Nothing bad unfolds, and neither does anything good. There is only the monotony of daily routines.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "To put it metaphoricallyâ€”it's like hungering without a morsel to sate you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Don\'t let "nothing happens" prevent you from acknowledging your sadness.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Can I still come to you when I'm feeling down?", 3: '35'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Absolutely... anytime.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'These exchanges with you are a form of sustenance for me.', 4: '1'}
